data.name: Wizard Man
data.detailed_description:
WIZARD MAN is a retro platformer inspired by action games of the late 20th century. Use magical spells to shoot projectiles at enemies in a strange medieval world. Learn new spells after defeating different bosses. Battle the warlock after beating all eight bosses and mastering all spells and upgrades.

WIZARD MAN - the super sorcerer and defender of the human race. For he dares to single-handedly penetrate the world's eight separate societies to stop the rapid expansion of dark magic, and vanquish those responsible for the destruction of the planet.

WIZARD MAN's goal is monumental. He must infiltrate eight heavily-guarded empires swarming with hostile creatures. By himself, he must free all those under the warlock's spell and restore peace to the kingdom. It's up to you to save the world!

data.short_description: It's WIZARD MAN versus the powerful leaders and fighting forces of the world! An epic fantasy land awaits, full of ferocious monsters conjured by an evil warlock through wrongfully performed experiments with dark magic. Will he succeed? You're in control!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: x32 Architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x32 Architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x32 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
